title: Yaen Ingu Vandhaan Lyrics Meaghamann Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song : Yaen Ingu Vandhaan
Movie : Meaghamann
Singer :Pooja AV
Music : SS Thaman
Lyrics : Karky

Yen ingu vandhaan
Pesaadhe endraan
sel endru sonnen
ennullae sendraan

Yen ingu vandhaan
Pesaadhe endraan
sel endru sonnen
ennullae sendraan

En azhagai rasikkiraan
en ilamai rusikkiraan
en idaiyin sarivilae
mazhai thuliyena urulkindraan

En thozhinil medhuvaai amarndhaan
en kobaththai medhuvaai suvaiththaan
en kangalin sivappai
alaginil yaendhi
kannaththil poosukindraan

Vidiya vidiya iraviani vadithu
kudikka seidhaaney.
kodiya kodiya valigalai kooda
pidikka seidhaanae

Yen ingu vandhaan
Pesaadhe endraan
sel endru sonnen
ennullae sendraan

Naa oliyil nadakkiren
en nizhazhaai thodaigiraan
en vilakkai anaikkiren
yen irulena padarkindraan

Mun anumadhiyindri nulaindhaan
en arayinil engum niraindhaan
idhu muraiyillai endraen
varaiyarai indri
ennai avan sirai pidithaan

Siraiyinullae siragugal thandhu
parakka seindhaanae
Kanavum nenavum thodum oru idathil
irukka seidhaaney

Yen ingu vandhaan
Pesaadhe endraan
sel endru sonnen
ennullae sendraan
